pkgmetadata.longdescription:
AlienFX is a Linux utility to control the lighting effects of Alienware computers. It provides both a command-line interface (alienfx) and an optional GTK-based graphical interface (alienfx-gtk).
Supported features include: - Control individual lighting zones on supported Alienware devices - Create and save lighting themes as JSON files - Configure lighting for different power states (boot, AC, battery, etc.) - Automatic device detection via USB - Interactive zone scanning for unsupported devices
The package includes udev rules to allow non-root access to the AlienFX USB controller hardware.

use.flag: Install the GTK-based graphical user interface (alienfx-gtk) in addition to the command-line interface
